synopsis.text: Arab ian folklore and modern technology intertwine in the futuristic city of Riyadh, 2050, as Asma, a loving grandmother, weaves tales of old for her cherished grandchildren. Through the lens of the region's most enchanting folktales, Asma reveals the wisdom of the past to guide her grandchildren through the complexities of the present. Joined by their robotic cat companion, the children embark on a journey through time, learning valuable lessons about trust, self-reliance, and the importance of heritage. This heartwarming Saudi Arabian original, part of Saudi Vision 2030, invites viewers to explore the rich history of the Arabian Peninsula and discover the timeless wisdom that connects generations.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
